text: "Don't Forget to Dance" is a 1983 song by British band The Kinks and is the second single from their 20th studio album State of Confusion. It went to number 58 in the United Kingdom, number 29 in the United States, number 26 in Canada and number 38 in New Zealand. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:The Kinks songs
title: Don't Forget to Dance
